txt.en: Find the stolen potatoes in Ost Lagorath
Elgar Crowfoot is holed up in Ost Lagorath to the north-east.\n\nYou should find the stolen potatoes there.

'I don't know a thing about fighting, but you look like you do. If you could defeat Elgar, you'd scare off his friends from ever approaching Gamwich! And I wouldn't have to steal any more food from my neighbours!\n\n'Elgar is holed up in Ost Lagorath to the north-east. Maybe you could draw him out by stealing back the remaining potatoes.'
These must be the stolen potatoes!
You have defeated Elgar Crowfoot and reclaimed the stolen potatoes.\n\nYou should return to Adro outside of Gamwich.
The ruffian Elgar Crowfoot has been taking Imbert's potatoes and threatening Gamwich. This will not stand!
If you defeat Elgar Crowfoot, the rest of the ruffians won't return to threaten Gamwich.\n\nYou should steal back the stolen potatoes to lure him out.
Take the stolen potatoes and defeat Elgar Crowfoot
'You're back! I'll take those potatoes back to Imbert. After all, I've got some apologies to make.'
